p: S. baicalensis were purchased from Tong Ren Tang Technologies Co. Ltd. (Beijing, China). Baicalein and compounds not listed below were from J&K Scientific (Beijing, China). 5,6-Dihydroxyflavone was purchased from Alfa Aesar (Haverhill, MA). 6,7-Dihydroxyflavone was synthesised by Shanghai Yuanye Biotechnology Co., Ltd. (Shanghai, China). Myricetin, quercetagetin, and herbacetin were purchased from MCE (Shanghai, China). Dihydromyricetin and myricetin were purchased from Targetmol (Boston, MA).
